item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

NoLives:

I remember hearing something about you and hixk. Are you in cahoots with that guy?

from what i know there’s another server using him at the moment for a couple of updates, But, I won’t mention the server in case it is not true as the name isn’t the greatest of names to be affiliated with servers.

After 24 hours i’ve managed to nearly gain 120 flats on combat stats, Rune is fairly easy to obtain and people are already pking, there was 20 recorded people last night obviously not all unique IP’s i don’t think, But still not bad at all.

item.dc:creator: @Raiden2 Raiden.
item.description:
@Raiden2 wrote:

[quote=“gawdz666, post:12, topic:552655”][quote author=stEps link=topic=671571.msg4491054#msg4491054 date=1438015028]
Everybody be warned that this guy was malicious in the past and will be again.

When i go to his old site he used justpk.me , my browser tells my it was used for an attack site that used other peoples computers to attacks others. Check the site for yourself everyone.

Furthermore This admin raiden came on my server and this is what was said proving that he is using this said attack site.

To be honest this post should be removed from here this is more than enough proof that this is no healthy to be on this website.

[/quote]

I just briefly checked the current client and there is no botnet in there as of now.

So free bump[/quote]

There never will be either. Thanks for the clarification though

item.dc:creator: @Raiden2 Raiden.
item.description:
@Raiden2 wrote:

[quote=“stEps, post:4, topic:552655”]It was Your website name for the old justpkme Lmao are you dumb?? no you deleted your ad that had that website in it Everyone can have a look though your old advertisement on here and see the maliciousness. Im sure rodgerwilco and many others will side with me.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Entirely different server and that forum was abandoned due to the fact Hixk got into it and fudged it up. While I appreciate your concern, please DO get your facts straight before throwing wild accusations around. Someone could lose an eye.

I’d also suggest reading all of the posts in that link you posted… all the information you need to know is in there.

All the best with your server, glad we cleared this up.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Raiden2 Raiden.
item.description:
@Raiden2 wrote:

You keep mentioning “justpk.me” please tell me where that site is anywhere associated with this server?

As for your cute little picture, I have 2 questions.

  1. Because I use the word ‘Botnet’ automatically means I have access/use of one? Haha how old are you Matt? Grow up. That’s just Selective slander to make sure more people join slaypk aka the grind PK server.

  2. Has your server been attacked? Didn’t think so…

Ask the players already on JustPK, all is fine and dandy. Don’t get mad at me you have a 9 month old server with 10 players.

You are a troll hence me posting at the end of my advert “Enterthetroll”. That one was just for you

Everyone who has re-joined JustPK, from SlayPK has already told me you are an idiot…

The fun lives on, Join now @ http://justpk.forumotion.co.uk/

Read full topic
